notes: Compilation of biomass studies, mainly in China. Original studies were visited to obtain other relevant variables.

citation.author: Liu
citation.title: How temperature, precipitation and stand age control the biomass carbon density of global mature forests
notes: Biomass data comprising some compilations of data from global mature forests. Some original studies were visited to check data accuracy and data was obtained directly from those. Data was obtained directly from these compilations in Liu: Keith et al. 2009, Baker et al. 2004, Ma et al. 2012

citation.author: IPCC
citation.title: 2006 IPCC Guidelines for National Greenhouse Gas Inventories
notes: Compilation of literature used for regional biomass estimates. Original studies were visited to obtain relevant variables for the tropics; some extratropical studies not finished.

citation.author: Luyssaert

variables: Eddy flux, C flux, and biomass
notes: Global compilation of flux and biomass data.

citation.author: Malhi
citation.title: The linkages between photosynthesis, productivity, growth and biomass in lowland Amazonian forests
notes: Compilation of C flux and aboveground biomass data in lowland Amazonian forests. Original studies were visited to obtain other relevant variables.

citation.author: Clark
citation.title: NPP Tropical Forest: Consistent Worldwide Site Estimates, 1967-1999, R1. Dataset.
notes: Compilation of NPP components and biomass data in tropical forests distributed globally (Clark et al., 2001, 2013, https://daac.ornl.gov/) and data compilations for individual sites.

citation.author: Clark
citation.title: Net primary production in tropical forests: An evaluation and synthesis of existing field data
notes: Compilation of NPP components and biomass data in tropical forests distributed globally (Clark et al., 2001, 2013, https://daac.ornl.gov/) and data compilations for individual sites.

citation.author: Litton
citation.title: Carbon allocation in forest ecosystems
notes: Compilation of C flux studies in Hawaii, Brazil, Australia, New Zealand, North America, and Canada. Original studies were visited to obtain other relevant variables.

citation.title: Breathing' of the terrestrial biosphere: lessons learned from a global network of carbon dioxide flux measurement systems
notes: Global compilation of eddy flux data.

notes: Woody ANPP data from 104 neotropical plots (incld. RAINFOR)

citation.title: Scale-dependent relationships between tree species richness and ecosystem function in forests
notes: ForestGEO.  Mean/std presented in Table S4 are not representative because they are calculated on a log scale. Biomass means for some sites deviate dramatcially from those calculated in other studies (e.g., Lutz et al. 2018). Also, Chave allometries were used for some extratropical sites.
